title: Why did the song 'Gangnam Style' go international so well? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my own personal opinion gangnam style became popular because of the catchy beat and dance when I first heard it I didnt know what it was about it but it just got me addicted to it I think that may have been the case also 2012 was the year of one hit wonders and hits with colorful pop and infectious beats going around gangnam was released at the right time
